languages.text: Инфопластина, которую охранял Глейто, принадлежит Соломону. И сведения, содержащиеся в ней, заслуживают приватной беседы с арбитром.
The data-slate that Glaito was guarding belongs to Solomorne. The information it contains warrants a private conversation with the Arbitrator.
languages.original_text: Инфопластина, которую охранял Глейто, принадлежит Соломону. И сведения, содержащиеся в ней, заслуживают приватной беседы с арбитром.

traits.locale_text: The data-slate that Glaito was guarding belongs to Solomorne. The information it contains warrants a private conversation with the Arbitrator, which is best had in the Lord Captain's chambers.
The data-slate that Glaito was guarding belongs to Solomorne. The information it contains warrants a private conversation with the Arbitrator, which is best had in the Lord Captain's chambers.

The data-slate that Glaito was guarding belongs to Solomorne. The information it contains warrants a private conversation with the Arbitrator.

languages.text: Der von Glaito bewachte Datablock gehört Solomorne. Die darauf enthaltenen Informationen rechtfertigen eine private Unterredung mit dem Arbitrator.
languages.original_text: The data-slate that Glaito was guarding belongs to Solomorne. The information it contains warrants a private conversation with the Arbitrator.

traits.locale_text: Der von Glaito bewachte Datablock gehört Solomorne. Die darauf enthaltenen Informationen rechtfertigen eine private Unterredung mit dem Arbitrator.

languages.text: La plaque de données que gardait Glaito appartient à Solomorne. Au vu des informations qu'elle contient, une conversation privée avec l'arbitrator s'impose.
languages.original_text: The data-slate that Glaito was guarding belongs to Solomorne. The information it contains warrants a private conversation with the Arbitrator.

traits.locale_text: La plaque de données que gardait Glaito appartient à Solomorne. Au vu des informations qu'elle contient, une conversation privée avec l'arbitrator s'impose.

languages.text: グライトが守っていたデータスレートはソロモーンのものだ。そのデータスレートに含まれている情報は重要なものなので、アービトレイターと個別に話し合う必要がある。
languages.original_text: The data-slate that Glaito was guarding belongs to Solomorne. The information it contains warrants a private conversation with the Arbitrator.

traits.locale_text: グライトが守っていたデータスレートはソロモーンのものだ。そのデータスレートに含まれている情報は重要なものなので、アービトレイターと個別に話し合う必要がある。

languages.text: La tablilla de datos que Glaito protegía pertenece a Solomorne. Su contenido justifica una conversación privada con el Arbitrator.
languages.original_text: The data-slate that Glaito was guarding belongs to Solomorne. The information it contains warrants a private conversation with the Arbitrator.

traits.locale_text: La tablilla de datos que Glaito protegía pertenece a Solomorne. Su contenido justifica una conversación privada con el Arbitrator.

languages.text: 格雷托看守的数据板是索罗蒙的私人物品，上面记载着有趣的信息。行商浪人打算亲自找索罗蒙谈谈。
languages.original_text: The data-slate that Glaito was guarding belongs to Solomorne. The information it contains warrants a private conversation with the Arbitrator.

traits.locale_text: 格雷托看守的数据板是索罗蒙的私人物品，上面记载着有趣的信息。行商浪人打算亲自找索罗蒙谈谈。
格雷托看守的数据板是索罗蒙的私人物品，上面记载着有趣的信息。行商浪人打算亲自找索罗蒙谈谈，这场谈话最好在行商浪人的房间里进行。

languages.text: Glaito'nun koruduğu databelanın Solomorne'a ait olduğu anlaşıldı. Lord Kaptan, Yargıcı ile databelada yazanlara dair konuşmaya karar verdi.
languages.original_text: The data-slate that Glaito was guarding belongs to Solomorne. The information it contains warrants a private conversation with the Arbitrator.

traits.locale_text: Glaito'nun koruduğu databelanın Solomorne'a ait olduğu anlaşıldı. Lord Kaptan, Yargıcı ile databelada yazanlara dair konuşmaya karar verdi.
